ygData.subject: Re: Old char-New Char..same person-Gary
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah so.....can borrow some mesh items from your monk char or not. i only got 2 Gp to my name. I notice that some of u created new char but will not sells of
ygData.messageBody:
Ah so.....can "borrow "some mesh items from your monk char or not. i only
got 2 Gp to my name.

I notice that some of u created new char but will not sells of items of old.
Just in case or sometimes u go back and play them again.

so how?

Yiyang of Innorruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 10:55 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Back to Innoruuk

dust,

>Alex wrote:

>> From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>>
>> Ok, dont mind a correction on Monk weight. Its 14 not 15 as was percived.
>> some sites still list it as 15. Tested it out myself and confirmed by
some
>> other monks.
>>
>> Monks r "Religous" about weight. So how to overcome the weight issue
>> 1) get Spirit Pouch, which is weighless, and all thing store inside it
is
>> also weightless..but.. Log, LD or lag out the spisit pouch will disappear
>> together with the content. ouch.
>> 2) get Lion backpack or something like that. high lvl stuff and hard to
>> find. not weighless but reduce alot of weight. use by Non-monk too.
>>
>> Monks dont need magical gloves at 30th lvl. all hit r magical at/above
lvl
>> 30th.
>>
>> Patchwork can wear but not fully patch on shoulder, cape etc,will be
>> overweight fast, mixed of cloth and others. Mesh is the best , light and
and
>> absorb damages.
>>
>> Yiyanging at Oasis
>>
